ai-patthana8.51:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.51:1.1_0: Not corruption, nor does the teaching because of defiling in conditions,
ai-patthana8.51:2.1_0: Not corruption, nor does the teaching because of defiling in conditions,
ai-patthana8.51:2.1_1: One does not give rise to the teaching, nor give rise to thoughts,
ai-patthana8.51:2.1_2: and things don’t arise for you who’re not dependent on thought. They’re not conceived and dull because of cause and reason.
ai-patthana8.51:3.1_0: corruption, nor is the cause of corruption, nor is the reason why the teaching gives rise to conditions for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana8.51:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.51:4.1_0: ... the result in all five ways ... surmounting ...”
